attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government wants to see 1000's of new homes built over the coming years on brownfield sites but green belt is consistently being eroded for new building.  This cannot go on - recent flooding in the area where I live is largely caused by the indiscriminate building of homes on water meadows and wildlife is suffering more than we imagine with their habitats being taken over for new building.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop concreting over the countryside."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11799.asp

Prime Minister's Office
